MetaField.name: Banner
MetaField.value: This is an autogenerated file. Any changes made to this file would likely be over-written at build time.

Struct.name: ReqRegisterParams
Struct.description: Request parameters for registering with Payload Controller

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: health_check_fail_action
Field.description: Action to be taken by PC on application health check failure

Field.name: sdk_version
Field.description: SDK version against used by client

Struct.name: RespRegisterParams
Struct.description: Response parameters following registration with Payload Controller

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: auth_token
Field.description: auth-token to be used in case secure communication had been requested for while registering

Struct.name: ReqGetCurrentLocationParams
Struct.description: Parameters for get current location request

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Struct.name: RespGetCurrentLocationParams
Struct.description: Response parameters for Get Location Flight Service

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: determined_at
Field.description: time (seconds since epoch) when the location was determined

Struct.name: ReqStageFileDownloadParams
Struct.description: Request parameters to stage file download

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: file_path
Field.description: File path relative to outbound mount-point

Struct.name: RespStageFileDownloadParams
Struct.description: Response parameters for stage file download reqeust

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Struct.name: RespShutdownParams
Struct.description: Response parameters for application shutdown request from PC

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: req_status
Field.description: status of payload application shutdown request

Struct.name: RespHealthCheckParams
Struct.description: Response parameters for Health Check request

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: reqs_to_pc_in_err_cnt
Field.description: Number of requests to PC that faced error

Field.name: resps_to_pc_in_err_cnt
Field.description: Number of responses to PC that faced error

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: sequence_id
Field.description: app-defined sequence-id for payload application to execute

Field.name: sequence_params
Field.description: app-defined sequence parameters corresponding to the sequence-id

Field.name: scheduled_deadline
Field.description: Epoch time till this sequence is allowed to run

Struct.name: ShutdownParams
Struct.description: Callback parameters notifying Application of imminent shutdown

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: grace_time
Field.description: grace time in seconds after which the VM will be powered down

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: reqs_to_pc_in_err_cnt
Field.description: Number of requests to PC that faced error

Field.name: resps_to_pc_in_err_cnt
Field.description: Number of responses to PC that faced error

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: used_counter
Field.description: Counters used out of maximum 32 counters

Struct.name: CmdSequenceDoneParams
Struct.description: Parameters for Command Sequence Done notification to Payload Controller

Field.name: sequence_id
Field.description: sequence id that has completed execution. MUST agree with StartSequenceParams.sequence-id.

Field.description: 1-bit flags = Time Validity,Position and Velocity ECI Validity, Position and Velocity ECEF Validity, Rate Validity, Attitude Validity,Lat-Lon-Altitude Validity,Nadir Vector Validity,GD Nadir Vector Validity,Beta Angle Validity

Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

Field.name: periodicity_in_ms
Field.description: Time between consecutive notifications in ms

Struct.name: AntarisApiCallbackFuncList
Struct.description: Callback-functions registration structure for channel creation

Field.name: process_health_check
Field.description: callback handler for health-check request from PC

Field.name: process_response_stage_file_download
Field.description: callback handler for stage file download response

Field.name: process_response_payload_power_control
Field.description: callback handler for payload power control response

Field.name: req_payload_metrics
Field.description: callback handler for request payload stats from PC

Field.name: process_response_gnss_eph_stop
Field.description: callback handler for GNSS EPH data stop response

Field.name: process_response_gnss_eph_start
Field.description: callback handler for GNSS EPH data start response

Field.name: process_cb_gnss_eph_data
Field.description: callback handler for GNSS EPH data

Field.name: process_response_get_eps_voltage_stop
Field.description: callback handler for get EPS voltage data stop

Field.name: process_response_get_eps_voltage_start
Field.description: callback handler for get EPS voltage data start

Field.name: process_cb_get_eps_voltage
Field.description: callback handler for EPS voltage data

Field.name: process_response_start_ses_therm_mgmnt_req
Field.description: callback handler for start SES thermal management req response

Field.name: process_response_stop_ses_therm_mgmnt_req
Field.description: callback handler for stop SES thermal management req response

Field.name: process_response_ses_temp_req
Field.description: callback handler for SES temperature req response

Field.name: process_cb_ses_thrml_ntf
Field.description: callback handler for SES thermal nofirication

Field.name: process_pa_satos_msg_response
Field.description: callback handler for PA to satOS command response

Field.name: correlation_id
Field.description: correlation id for matching requests with responses and callbacks

FunctionPtr.name: StartSequence_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback indicating specific sequence can begin

Parameter.description: String containing sequence name/id and parameters that PA wants to run

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessResponseStageFileDownload_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback for stage file download response

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespGnssEphStopDataReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback for GNSS EPS stop data request

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespGnssEphStartDataReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback for GNSS EPS start data response

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespGetEpsVoltageStopReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback for get EPS voltage stop data request

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespGetEpsVoltageStartReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback for GNSS EPS start data request

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespStartSesThermMgmntReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: callback handler for start SES thermal management req response

Parameter.description: response to thermal management start req

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespStopSesThermMgmntReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: callback handler for stop SES thermal management req response

Parameter.description: response to thermal management stop req

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespSesTempReq_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: callback handler for SES temperature req response

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessSesThrmlNtf_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback request to SES thermal notifictaion

FunctionPtr.name: ProcessRespPaSatOsMsg_Fptr
FunctionPtr.description: Callback for PA SatOS message request

Parameter.description: response PA to SatOS command response

Function.name: api_pa_pc_create_channel
Function.description: Create a channel for use as API Context

Parameter.description: Handlers for callbacks from Payload Controller

Function.description: Create an insecure channel for use as API Context

Parameter.description: Handlers for callbacks from Payload Controller

Function.name: api_pa_pc_stage_file_download
Function.description: API to stage a file for download

Function.name: api_pa_pc_sequence_done
Function.description: Inform Payload Controller about completion of a sequence

Function.name: api_pa_pc_response_health_check
Function.description: API to respond to health-check request from PC

Function.description: API to respond to shutdown request from PC

Function.name: api_pa_pc_response_payload_metrics
Function.description: API to respond to payload-stats request from PC

Function.name: api_pa_pc_gnss_eph_stop_req
Function.description: API to request to stop GNSS EPS

Function.name: api_pa_pc_gnss_eph_start_req
Function.description: API to request to start GNSS EPS

Function.name: api_pa_pc_get_eps_voltage_stop_req
Function.description: API to request to stop get EPS voltage

Parameter.description: get EPS voltage stop response parameters

Function.name: api_pa_pc_get_eps_voltage_start_req
Function.description: API to request to start get EPS voltage

Function.name: api_pa_pc_start_ses_therm_mgmnt_req

Function.name: api_pa_pc_stop_ses_therm_mgmnt_req
Function.description: API to request to stop SES thermal management

Function.description: API to request to SES temperature
